title: Pulsefire and some other summoner icons missing
body: I have the skins and bought it but the icon and some others (dont know their names but specifically the annie bear with fire in the background) are missing from my account.

replies.body:
Hey Aethlius!

I went ahead and checked your account really quickly.  From checking on our end, it seems that you do have the Pulsefire Ezreal Summoner Icon, as well as others you have purchased on your account in your inventory.  Sometimes, the icons can get lost in the middle due to the sheer amount and are easy to scroll past.  

Could you try just triple-checking line by line to ensure you aren't able to see it on your account?  If you can confirm its missing, can you list out exactly what icons you are unable to see in your list so I can possibly take some further actions?

Let me know!
after the patch they all came back, or idk if you did something but they are there now and werent before. (Had a friend look too so i didnt think I was crazy) but thank you ^_^ glad to have them back

It seems weird that they would exist, and then suddenly disappear.  Can you try seeing exactly which ones are missing and respond back to me with their names?  I should be able to look into it further for you!
btw. Speaking of missing icons. What about the Fizz icon for OCE that was said to be available on all servers?? I still haven't seen it. Don't have icons from DJ Sona on PBE either.
